backend/main.mo: Defines event comparison logic and extensive types for competitions, payments, user profiles, attempts, and results.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptive summaries of various frontend components, pages, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with light/dark theme CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/public/env.json: Stores backend canister ID for environment configuration.
frontend/public/razorpay.config.json: Razorpay payment configuration including key, currency, branding, and theme.
frontend/REGRESSION_SMOKE_TEST_CHECKLIST: Manual regression and smoke test checklist covering authentication, competitions, payments, and solve flow recovery.
frontend/src/api/errors.ts: Maps various backend error messages to user-friendly strings via a normalizeError function.
frontend/src/api/queryKeys.ts: Defines reusable React Query keys for auth, competitions, sessions, leaderboards, and admin data.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app entry defining routes, providers, and global application structure.
frontend/src/components/admin/Competitio: Renders form fields for selecting and configuring competition pricing modes, updating FeeMode on changes.
Protects admin routes by checking identity and admin status, showing loading or access-denied states.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Displays a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps protected content and prompts users to log in if unauthenticated, with a loading state.
frontend/src/components/competition/Comp: Shows a clickable competition card with status, dates, participant limit, and event count, navigating on click.
Provides the main app layout with navigation, header, mobile menu, auth display, and admin links.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Lead: Renders a leaderboard table showing ranks, competitor names, average of 5, and individual solve times with penalties. Handles profile lookup, navigation, and rank icon display.
frontend/src/components/profile/Payments: Displays a user's payment history with sorting, loading/error states, and detailed cards for each payment. Shows competition info, amount, date, and payment ID.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileM: Provides a profile dropdown menu showing user info and navigation options. Supports logging out and loading states.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal dialog for creating a new user profile by submitting email and display name. Handles email setup and profile creation with validations.
frontend/src/components/solve/Inspection: Implements a 15‑second inspection countdown with scramble visibility toggle. Notifies parent on start and completion using stable callbacks.
frontend/src/components/solve/SolveCompl: Shows a completion screen after finishing all solves with navigation actions. Includes instructions for submitting video evidence.
frontend/src/components/solve/SolveTimer: Interactive solve timer component that tracks elapsed time, handles start/stop actions, and reports results to a parent callback.
frontend/src/components/system/ActorInit: Displays a connection error message with troubleshooting steps and a retry button.
frontend/src/config/razorpay.ts: Loads Razorpay payment configuration at runtime with caching and fallback defaults.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBeforeUnloadWarnin: Adds a beforeunload browser warning when enabled to prevent accidental page exit.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the current caller's user profile once an actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useGoLiveAttempt.ts: Manages a multi‑step deployment simulation with preflight checks, step tracking, diagnostics, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout helpers, and persisted identity management.
Blocks browser navigation with a confirmation dialog when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for authentication, profiles, admin checks, competitions, results, and payments; converted types mirror backend structures.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/src/lib/ao5.ts: Provides types and a function to calculate an average-of-five puzzle score with DNF handling.
frontend/src/lib/competitionPricing.ts: Determines if competitions are paid and formats or extracts pricing information based on fee modes.
frontend/src/lib/csv.ts: Exports competition results to CSV and includes utilities for generating and downloading CSV files.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into readable dates and date-times using US locale options.
frontend/src/lib/goLiveDiagnostics.ts: Simulates deployment steps with progress callbacks, random failure simulation, and error normalization.
frontend/src/lib/goLivePreflight.ts: Runs preflight checks for environment, payment config, connectivity, and build artifacts, returning failures if any.
frontend/src/lib/razorpay.ts: Loads the Razorpay SDK and opens the payment checkout with configured options and success handling.
frontend/src/lib/solveSession.ts: Stores, retrieves, and clears solve session tokens and attempts in sessionStorage with Uint8Array handling.
frontend/src/lib/timeUtils.ts: Formats times in milliseconds into seconds.millisecond strings, returning DNF for invalid values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity context, applying global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCompetitio: Displays all competitions to admins with actions to create, edit, delete, lock/unlock, and activate/deactivate them.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCreateComp: Provides a form for admins to create competitions, configure events, scrambles, dates, fees, and submit to the backend with validation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEditCompet: Allows admins to edit an existing competition’s details, events, scrambles, status, and pricing with data loaded from the backend.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminGoLivePage: Runs and displays deployment preflight checks and step-by-step progress for deploying the application, with diagnostics export options.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLandingPag: Shows the admin dashboard with navigation to user, competition, results management, and quick actions like creating competitions or starting deployment.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminResultsPag: Admin page for viewing, filtering, exporting, and toggling visibility of competition results using admin query hooks.
Admin interface for listing users, blocking/unblocking, deleting accounts, viewing solve history, and resetting competition status.
frontend/src/pages/CompetitionDetailPage: Displays competition details, handles event selection, session start, and paid registration using Razorpay checkout.
Fetches and lists competitions grouped by status with cards for running, upcoming, and completed events.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Shows leaderboard for a selected competition event, computing ranks and Ao5, with navigation back to competition details.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardsHubPage.t: Lists all competitions with status and dates, linking to each competition’s leaderboard; requires authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays and edits the authenticated user's profile info and provides access to payment history.
frontend/src/pages/PublicProfilePage.tsx: Shows a public competitor profile with stats and event‑grouped results, linking back to leaderboards.
frontend/src/pages/SolveFlowPage.tsx: Implements the solve flow for competitors, handling session recovery, timers, attempt progression, and backend synchronization for a competition event.
frontend/src/types/admin.ts: Defines admin-side types for results, public profiles, and user summaries used in administrative features.
frontend/src/types/backend-extended.ts: Local extensions of backend-generated types including competitions, fee modes, results, leaderboards, and session-state responses.
frontend/src/types/domain.ts: Maps event enums to labels and exports event constants and defaults used across the app.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing and persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, and theme settings with plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project-level metadata describing the platform’s features, architecture, known issues, and development state.
